english.segment1: We've both been mistreated, no wish to repeat this. You're sorry - you wonder. If ever I'll show you grace again
english.segment2: My vision is tunneled, my motives, oh so rageful. But the mirror I'm reading. Says "forgive, and then forgive again"
english.segment3: Though there's a wrong. A grudge will tear us down. We wait too long, the air turns stale. Will we reconcile?. It's all we're needing reconcile. It's all we're needing to mend these broken smiles
english.segment4: Oh miserable me, miserable you. The walls erected between us. You keep your side, I'll not intrude
english.segment5: And we'll get used to this denial. Turn our heads and wait a while. Much too long, the air turns stale. Will we reconcile?
